game.name: Veggies War
game.shortDescription: Veggies War - Top Down shooter game in which you have to shoot back from enemies in the form of vegetables, under your control a piece of bread, armed with a special gun and which from room to room learns new abilities!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Veggies War - Top Down shooter game in which you have to shoot back from enemies in the form of vegetables, under your control a piece of bread, armed with a special gun and which from room to room learns new abilities!
